So they <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> "The <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3615>consumed<s%> us, and <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1819>planned<s%> to <S%H8045>exterminate<s%> us from <S%H3320>remaining<s%> within <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

"]
